
```{python}
import pandas as pds
```

```{python}
data=pds.read_csv("Data/pre_preocessed.csv")
#data.drop("Timestamp",axis=1,inplace=True)
```
```{python}
#normalizing age column
norm=Normalizer()
norm.fit(data.Age.values.reshape(-1,1))
Age=norm.transform(data.Age.values.reshape(-1,1))
```
#One hot encoding Categorical features

```{python}
numerical_vectors=pds.DataFrame(hstack(( Age, Gender, Country, self_employed,
       family_history, work_interfere, no_employees,
       remote_work, tech_company, benefits, care_options,
       wellness_program, seek_help, anonymity, leave,
       mental_health_consequence, phys_health_consequence, coworkers,
       supervisor, mental_health_interview, phys_health_interview,
       mental_vs_physical, obs_consequence)).toarray())
       
(numerical_vectors)
```

